item.title: Site Refresh!
item.description:
Welcome to my freshly redesigned personal blog and profile website! The site will now focus on my business and contracting work.

If you are looking for old blog content I’ve moved it to an archive section. If you are looking for something related to Albania, you can find it in the albania section
